channel.title: Redraw graphics
channel.description:
Hello everyone, For testing a script i need to find a way to reload the graphics in my client, It happends when you come in a new region (when you see loading please wait). How can i a make a command to do this without going to a new region?
Gr Yohurt

Dont have a clue sorry.
